tags.name: umb-avatar
tags.description:
### Umbraco avatar 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-avatar 
    size='{string}' 
    img-src='{string}' 
    img-srcset='{string}'>
</umb-avatar> 
 ```

 Required properties: `size`, `img-src`, `img-srcset`

attributes.name: size
attributes.description:
The size of the avatar 

 Options: `xs`, `s`, `m`, `l`, `xl` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: img-src
attributes.description:
The image source to the avatar 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: img-srcset
attributes.description:
Reponsive support for the image source 

 Type: `string`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco avatar directive `umbAvatar`
